long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HTML to Figma - by DemoWay (Pixel-Perfect Web to Figma Design)

âœ¨ Why HTML to Figma

1. Pixel-Perfect: What you see on the webpage is what you get in Figma
2. 100% original high-definition image: from the source site. No more blurry images on your retina screen.
3. Product Tour: Import multiple sequential pages and interactions at once: Great for making quick adjustments to existing product processes, especially suitable for dashboard-type products.
4. Supports Auto Layout Import .
5. Supports mapping missing fonts before import, any missing fonts that are not available on your local will be bundled for you to download and install.
6. Supports updating the fonts used after import. 
7. A large number of creators like you are using this plugin worldwide right now. View real-time user distribution statistics map here: https://demoway.com/html-to-figma#user-map
